\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* going \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evil cut off \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* cause \w my|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3518"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* cover \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* south \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* north:

Make sounds \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w grief|strong="H1697"\w*, son \w of|strong="H3068"\w* man; \w with|strong="H0413"\w* body bent \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bitter heart make sounds \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w grief|strong="H1697"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, Why \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* making sounds \w of|strong="H1121"\w* grief? \w then|strong="H7760"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* news, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* coming: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* every heart \w will|strong="H3478"\w* become soft, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* all hands \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* feeble, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* every spirit \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* burning low, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* all knees \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w turned|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* water: see, \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* coming \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* done, says \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Son \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w*, say \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* prophet, \w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w*: Say, \w A|strong="H3772"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* sharp \w and|strong="H2719"\w* polished:

\w Give|strong="H0935"\w* loud cries \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* sounds \w of|strong="H3027"\w* grief, \w O|strong="H3069"\w* son \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rulers \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Israel: fear \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* signs \w of|strong="H3027"\w* grief.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w then|strong="H1571"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* \w prophet|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* put \w your|strong="H0559"\w* hands \w together|strong="H1571"\w* \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* loud sound, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* give two blows \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* three; \w it|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* wounded, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* wounded; \w the|strong="H0559"\w* great \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w which|strong="H2719"\w* goes round \w about|strong="H2719"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* put \w my|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w together|strong="H2199"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* loud sound, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H5221"\w* ways marked \w out|strong="H0413"\w*, \w so|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* king \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w may|strong="H0120"\w* come; \w let|strong="H3717"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w two|strong="H5221"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* come \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0120"\w* land: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H3717"\w* there \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* pillar \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* top \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* road:

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Babylon \w took|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* at \w the|strong="H6440"\w* parting \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ways, at \w the|strong="H6440"\w* top \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* two roads, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* use \w of|strong="H6440"\w* secret arts: shaking \w the|strong="H6440"\w* arrows this \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H7760"\w*, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* questions \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* images \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* gods, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w took|strong="H7760"\w* note \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* inner parts \w of|strong="H6440"\w* dead beasts.

\w At|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H1571"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* fate \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Jerusalem, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w give|strong="H5117"\w* orders \w for|strong="H0413"\w* destruction, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* send \w up|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* war-cry, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w put|strong="H5117"\w* engines \w of|strong="H3068"\w* war \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* doors, lifting \w up|strong="H0413"\w* earthworks, building walls.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* given \w by|strong="H3068"\w* secret arts \w will|strong="H3068"\w* seem false \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* given \w their|strong="H3068"\w* oaths \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* broken: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w the|strong="H0559"\w* memory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* evil-doing \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H0935"\w* cause \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H4428"\w* said: \w Because|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* evil-doing \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* mind \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* uncovering \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* wrongdoing, \w causing|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* sins \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* seen \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* evil-doings; \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* mind, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w taken|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w*, O evil \w one|strong="H1121"\w*, wounded \w to|strong="H0935"\w* death, O ruler \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* day \w has|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* time \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* last punishment;

\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Take|strong="H7200"\w* away \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holy head-dress, \w take|strong="H7200"\w* \w off|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* crown: \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H0517"\w* again: let \w that|strong="H3588"\w* which \w is|strong="H1870"\w* low \w be|strong="H0517"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* which \w is|strong="H1870"\w* high \w be|strong="H0517"\w* made low.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* overturned, overturned, overturned: this \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w again|strong="H1961"\w* till \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* whose \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w*; \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.
